original_title: Song of Umm Dalaila: The Story of the Saharawis
overview: The film takes place in the Saharawi refugee camps in Algeria against the historical backdrop of Spanish colonialism and the Morroccan invasion of the Western Sahara. The Saharawi women, who make up 80% of the adult refugee population, provide a powerful voice as they reveal how they came to assume primary responsibility for the survival of the remains of their families and in turn the entire refugee population
title: Song of Umm Dalaila: The Story of the Saharawis
